content: slender can cozy written and designed by amy kate sutherland this fun can cozy features the half_double_crochet stitch and is designed to hold a taller and more slim beverage i hope you enjoy this fun and useful make slender can cozy | page 1 of 2 rounds 7-18 materials chain 1 half_double_crochet in ea st around slip_stitch to the first - 25 grams of worsted weight yarn st sample uses wecrochet dishie round 19 - 4 0mm crochet hook chain 1 single_crochet in ea st around slip_stitch to the first st - scissors and a yarn needle gauge finishing 4 stitches and 3 rounds = 1 inch in half pull through the last st cut yarn and weave double_crochet worked in the round in any ends abbreviations find and follow me chain chain instagram @thegracefultangle single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet etsy the graceful tangle slip_stitch slip_stitch ea each pinterest the graceful tangle * * repeat instructions in asterisks st s stitch es youtube the graceful tangle email thegracefultangle@gmail com pattern notes - find the yarn featured in this pattern here thank you - find a full video tutorial to go along thank you so much for supporting me and with this pattern here my small business by choosing to make my pattern i hope it has left you feeling inspired and motivated to continue enjoying the art pattern of knitting and crochet but even more make a magic_ring or chain 3 and slip_stitch to the importantly always remember that no first st to form a ring matter who you are what you ve been round 1 through what you re going through or what half_double_crochet 6 into ring slip_stitch to the first st 6 sts you will go through god loves you he round 2 loves you so much that he sent his one and chain 1 half_double_crochet 2 in ea st around slip_stitch to the first only son jesus to die on the cross for your st 12 sts sins the decision to follow him will be the row 3 most important and the most rewarding chain 1 *half_double_crochet in the next st half_double_crochet 2 in the next decision you ll ever make he loves you st* around slip_stitch to the first st 18 sts round 6 chain 1 *half_double_crochet in ea of the next 2 sts half_double_crochet 2 in the next st* around slip_stitch to the first st 24 sts slender can cozy | page 2 of 2
